document.full_text: william donald schaefer, the former mayor of baltimore, was ushered through the city monday like a head of state, his coffin on a whirlwind tour of this city that he loved.
document.title: baltimore journal: for late 'mr. mayor,' a last tour of town
lines_and_colors: william donald schaefer, the former mayor of baltimore, was ushered through the city monday like a head of state, his coffin on a whirlwind tour of this city that he loved.
